attributes.title: OH NO!
attributes.review: So I’m a big support of Cheeto and I luv him and he’s so great but as soon as I opened the app a big ole gross dude showed up to my house asking for a chainsaw and I had to tell him no but then he kept coming back and after I deleted the app he left. Serious bugs with this app. Must take it down. Wayyyy too many malfunctions.

attributes.title: Just no 🥰
attributes.review: So I got this app just so I could leave a review and tell you how much I hate Trump! 😗 I opened the app and I was greeted with his ugly face and I’m currently crying, I feel as though his face will scar me for life. 😭 So if you would please get rid of this app for the well being of the innocent children out there that would be great 🥰✌🏻

This app is so bad. The moment I got on it it sent racial slurs to all my contacts. I don’t know how but it managed to track my grandmas address and paid people to knock on her door and body slam her like John cena. It doesn’t end there, after two days of owning the app my dad left and my mom got hit by a car. #blacklivesmatter✊🏾

attributes.title: EMBARRASSING🤡🙈
attributes.review: When I got this app my battery percentage dropped like 15% and I was only on it for 3 minutes!!! Also I was traumatized by the image I saw of the creepy Cheeto when I literally first clicked on it. Plz take this app down I don’t want my kids getting nightmares if they ever click on this app and see the gigantic Cheeto puff called trump!!!😞

attributes.title: This app is so bad!
attributes.review: I honestly have no idea why this app is even an app. I cannot believe how much stress this app has given me. I open the app and my phone crashes and then I open again see some wack news. This is just an over all bad app I hated my time with it. It just needs to be deleted.

attributes.title: revoltingly distasteful
attributes.review: i am completely flabbergasted by this app. i was looking for my socks all day but all this app gave me was nightmares. it gave me no sense of direction AT ALL instead it killed my moose. Chantilly was the best moose ever in the world but this foul creature destroyed everything. i will not stand for this EVER. me and my husband forest will keep on running until this app is DEMOLISHED.

attributes.title: Worst app ever🤮🤢
attributes.review: I got this app to see if there are any more protest or rally’s it took forever and when I say forever i mean FOREVER and then It finally loaded I seen a  blown up picture of Donald trump AKA a Cheeto i screamed my lungs out it scared the me to the point I had nightmares every night I couldn’t sleep for days Donald Trump you scared the life out of me😭😭

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER !!! (DO NOT RECOMMEND)
attributes.review: This app is horrible first off it glitches out my phone every time I useless it it makes my phone overheat to the point where it’s burning my hand. Then when I get into the app there’s a really ugly and I mean horrific orange man with a tupee and I mean he’s everywhere so I’m just stuck looking at him like this👁👄👁.

attributes.title: Don’t even bother
attributes.review: I was eating cheez it’s and almost threw up after seeing the resemblance with trumps orange face. Deleting this app RIGHT NOW so I can eat my cheez it’s in peace. I wish I could give this app negative stars. It felt so good to delete and wash away the disgusting feeling of associating with a sexist, racist, homophobic, idiotic campaign. Let’s get this orange clown out of office!! 🤡🍑

attributes.title: Worst app EVER 🤮
attributes.review: I had great expectations for this app when I first downloaded it but they quickly went away as soon as I open the app. The first ting I saw was lots of bide and inappropriate pictures as well as profanity. I was shocked, I mean I was in tears almost. Let’s just say you should not download this horrible evil excuse of an app!
